original_text: The same day the king consecrated the middle of the court that was before the house of the Lord, for there he offered the burnt offering and the grain offering and the fat pieces of the peace offerings, because the bronze altar that was before the Lord was too small to receive the burnt offering and the grain offering and the fat pieces of the peace offerings.
korean_text: 그 날에 왕이 여호와의 성전 앞뜰 가운데를 거룩히 구별하고 거기서 번제와 소제와 감사제물의 기름을 드렸으니 이는 여호와의 앞 놋제단이 작으므로 번제물과 소제물과 화목제의 기름을 다 용납할 수 없음이라

sentences.original_text: The same day the king consecrated the middle of the court
sentences.korean_translation: 그 날 왕은 뜰의 가운데를 구별하여 드렸으니

sentences.original_text: that was before the house of the Lord
for there he offered the burnt offering
and the fat pieces of the peace offerings
was too small to receive the burnt offering
and the fat pieces of the peace offerings
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 화목제물의 기름 부분을 받기에도 작았다
